job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Go development and building software products, with mentions of AI-powered platforms and Generative AI tools. However, the core responsibilities and technologies described are centered around traditional software engineering (Go, mobile apps, community tools, platform code) rather than the specialized development, fine-tuning, or deployment of generative models themselves. The role appears to be a senior software engineer position that *interacts* with AI systems, rather than a role focused on building or engineering the AI models or GenAI applications directly. Therefore, it does not fit the 'ML Engineer' or 'GenAI Engineer' profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'development and delivery of our software products and apps', 'write production-grade product and platform code', 'designing and implementing systems', 'launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms', and 'develop our Community Tools'. This aligns with traditional software engineering tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: development and delivery of our software products and apps

job_tasks.justification: The role requires writing code that is ready for production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes taking ownership of the technical design and implementation of components.
job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding user needs and contributing to solutions that cater to them, as well as empowering users to maximize benefits.
job_tasks.phrase: cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing systems that interact with an AI platform, focusing on scalability, reliability, and security.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions working with 'Generative AI tool' (CF Spark) and an 'AI Chatbot', indicating interaction with or development around generative AI technologies, though the primary focus is on the engineering of the surrounding systems.
job_tasks.phrase: CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions developing an 'AI Chatbot', which involves working with or building upon AI models.
The role involves working with a team and promoting a culture of feedback and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions promoting a culture of feedback and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture

job_tasks.justification: The role requires working with an agile mindset and iterating fast, implying adaptability and continuous learning.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions making data-driven decisions, which is a pragmatic approach to problem-solving.
The role requires taking responsibility for component technical designs and delivering quality code, indicating ownership.
job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs
